data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for For The Board Meeting Held Today On January 30, 2023
data.news_body:
KP Energy Limited has informed the Exchange about the outcome of the Board Meeting held on January 30, 2023, wherein the Board has considered and approved the unaudited financial statements for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022, and declared third Interim Dividend of Re. 0.25 per equity share of the Company.

The Outcome is attached herewith.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for The Board Meeting Held On January 17, 2022
data.news_body:
KP Energy Limited has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company was held today i.e. January 17, 2022, inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2021 (Q3FY22) and declared the Second interim dividend at 2.5% i.e. Re. 0.25 per equity share.

The outcome of the meeting is attached herewith.
